meanings.sent1: I stopped by the superette to grab some milk and bread.
meanings.sent2: The superette on the corner is convenient for quick grocery runs.
meanings.sent3: The superette had a sale on snacks, so I stocked up on chips.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a superette of warmth in the cold room.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign of the superette glowed brightly in the night.

meanings.definition: A small store selling a limited variety of goods.
meanings.sent1: The superette down the street sells newspapers and candy.
meanings.sent2: I like to browse the superette for unique gifts.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the superette looking for a hardware store.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a superette of random facts and trivia.
meanings.sent5: The shelves of the superette were neatly organized and inviting.
